feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
